• multiple hypopigmented lesions on extremities.
• normal fundi and cardiac examination
anti-seizure medications
physical therapy
• widespread subcortical tubers.
• subependymal nodules which mildly enhance.
tuberous sclerosis
• supependymal heterotopia
• tuberous sclerosis
2 year old girl with infantile seizures.  moderate developmental delay, she speaks only three words  - "sarah palin president".
